page.title: 04Education in NW Derby
page.content: In our area there are 3 State Nursery Schools for children aged 3-5. There are 11 State Maintained Schools for children aged 5-11, two of which also take nursery age children. (One of these is a Roman Catholic and one a Church of England School.) There is one Private Primary school and one Roman Catholic Private Primary School. There is an Annexe for a State Comprehensive School for children aged 11-18 and a Roman Catholic Comprehensive for children aged 11-18. For adults there is one Teachers' Centre, one Adults Educational Centre one College of Higher Education and an Annexe to the College of Further Education. These are all run by the State. There is one Educational Resources Centre.
